attributes.action: Introduce Makaton/BSL into the national curriculum.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that makaton and BSL have such a vital role to play in the support for children with speech difficulties and the wider community. If everyone learnt Makaton and/or BSL then there would be no barriers in communication.
attributes.background: I would like the government to introduce the teaching of Makaton and BSL into the national curriculum. I work with and know a lot of children who have difficulty communicating verbally and have started introducing makaton. It has helped them to understand and communicate with the people around them.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331031
